result.execSummary:
On one or more charges, the deferred prosecution or sentencing agreement(s) on this case were fulfilled, and the charge(s) were dismissed.

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Troy Nile Hinz

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
ADDRESS INFO for Troy Nile Hinz
Current: 1330 Walnut St., #8, Baraboo, WI 53913 United States  (Effective: 08-01-2016)
Prior: E10576 Terrytown Rd, Baraboo, WI 53913 United States

Defendant Troy Nile Hinz in court.  Sue Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant gives status.  Treatment started this week.  State gives recommendation.  Plea to Count 1.  Dismiss/read in Count 2.  NCP entered, advised of const. rights, plea accepted by Ct.  Ct. withholds adj. of guilt. Deferred Prosecution Ordered 12 mo. on Ct. 1; filed agreement today.

Defendant Troy Nile Hinz in court.  Sue Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  DE waives counsel.  Court questions DE on counsel waiver/accepts.  Recess to have DE talk to DA's office.  Back on the record, Court resets matter so DA can get the paperwork they need per ADA Hoffman.  Bond continued.  Return date scheduled for November 19, 2015 at 01:00 pm.

Pre-trial conference at 10-16-2015 08:00 am.
Return date at 10-30-2015 01:00 pm.

Defendant Troy Nile Hinz in court.  Sue Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  DE wants more time to talk with ADA Hoffman.  Bond continues.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for October 16, 2015 at 08:00 am.  Return date scheduled for October 30, 2015 at 01:00 pm.

Defendant Troy Nile Hinz in court.  Sue Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Assessment needs to be completed prior to the plea.  Defendant agrees.  Reset to allow time to complete that assessment.  Bond continues.  Return date scheduled for October 8, 2015 at 01:00 pm.

ADDRESS INFO for Troy Nile Hinz
Current: E10576 Terrytown Rd, Baraboo, WI 53913 United States  (Effective: 07-23-2015)
Prior: S4492 Belter Drive, North Freedom, WI 53951

Pre-trial conference at 08-14-2015 11:00 am.
Return date at 08-27-2015 01:00 pm.

Defendant Troy Nile Hinz in court.  Sue Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant waives reading of complaint.  Advised rights to an attorney.  File set for pre-trial conference/return date.  Bond continued w/added conditions.  Special bond conditions as follows:  No contact w/L.H. or her residence and no violent or abusive contact in front of his children (HLH and HBJH).  May return to residence one time upon prior notice and w/law enforcement to retrieve belongings if necessary.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for August 14, 2015 at 11:00 am.  Return date scheduled for August 27, 2015 at 01:00 pm.
